text: A lot can be improved, overall, the school isn't what it used to be. Teachers can be more professional and not chase me umpteen times on what time I will arrive to pick up my child especially when I'm in the middle of work. If I had a choice, I would not be working and stay home with my kid. Obviously I work to make ends meet. That being said, they do try and they are pretty affordable and located next to MRT. Teaching standards can further improve, there is no spelling for K2 which is unheard of.
True way kindergarten is an affordable pre school and the Teachers are caring and professional in their teaching to the children. It is very accessible as it is right next to the MRT station.
Right next to Queenstown MRT.Teachers are professional and caring.Principal Lina is very friendly ,caring .Highly recommend this school

Service 10/10
Even I was concerning about the Church services and operations and the staff still respectfully and politely answered upon my concern without any doubts(: Thank you
